T02D2202:124a-1: a'a r+ya n'i l'am ba ra dha ra n'a ma tantra t'i k'a /
T02D2202:124a-3: 'phags pa gos sngon po can zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher bshad pa /
T02D2202:124a-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2202:124a-5: 'gro ba gang gis mi shes rab rib se la bde ba dag la legs 'god pa //
T02D2202:124b-0: mgon po sgrib pa kun spangs @124b yon tan ma
T02D2202:124b-1: lus kun gyi bdag nyis 'khor lo dpa' bo sde
T02D2202:124b-2: dpon che // nyes dang nyes bral kun spangs bde
T02D2202:124b-3: ba bla med dag dang rab bcas kun du sna
T02D2202:124b-5: rgyal ba gsang chen rdo rje can dang bdag por bcas la kun nas dang pas phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2202:124b-6: gang zhig gsal bar ma bshad 'gro ba thams cad mun 'drar 'thoms 'gyur zhing //
T02D2202:124b-7: shes rab mig dmar phyi phyir gang gis gang bshad pa //

T02D2202:124b-10: ci nus gang gnas dpung bcas shes rab legs bsdams gang thob de dag dgrol bar bya //
T02D2202:124b-11: 'di skad bdag gis thos zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2202:124b-12: pa'i tshig 'di dag gis ni rgyud 'di brjod par
T02D2202:124b-13: bya ba dang / dgos pa dang 'brel pa dang /
T02D2202:124b-14: dgos pa'i yang dgos ba bstan te /
T02D2202:124b-15: 'di ltar brjod par bya ba med pa'i tshig la ni /
T02D2202:124b-16: nam yang rtog pa sngon du gtong ba rnams 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
T02D2202:124b-17: smyon pa'i tshig lta bu yin la /
T02D2202:124b-18: nyan pa po slob pa dag kyang de lta bu'i
T02D2202:124b-19: tshig la zhugs nas ldog par 'gyur ba nyid do
T02D2202:124b-20: // brjod par bya ba yang tha snyad tsam du med pa ma yin gyi /
T02D2202:124b-21: dngos po la med pa nyid do //
T02D2202:124b-22: gal te brjod par bya ba bstan kyang dgos pa ma bstan na yang de bzhin te /
T02D2202:124b-23: gyis pa'i tshig gam gang du gzhan gyi tshig bzhin
T02D2202:124b-24: du dgos pa med do zhes bstan par 'gyur ba
T02D2202:124b-25: nyid do // brjod dgos pa'ang gzhan gyi bsgrub pa yin gyi /
T02D2202:124b-26: de la gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02D2202:124b-27: 'brel pa med pa'i tshig la de bzhin te /
T02D2202:124b-28: dper na rta brjod pa'i sgras glang po la sogs pa lta bu yin la /
T02D2202:124b-29: de lta na yang de bzhin du 'gyur ba nyid do //
T02D2202:124b-30: gal te dgos pa'i dgos pa ma bstan na yang de bzhin te ;
T02D2202:124b-31: 'di ltar gang zhig gi 'bras bu med pa'i rtogs pa 'dis ci zhig bya /
T02D2202:124b-32: dper na bud med bud med la 'brel pa'i yan
T02D2202:124b-33: lag rten pa lta bu dang ma ni nga gi
T02D2202:124b-34: gzungs la 'dod chags can rtog pa lta bu ste
T02D2202:125a-0: / bdag kyang ci nas yi 'chad par 'gyur ro zhes yongs su @125a * //
T02D2202:125a-1: brtags nas 'jug par mi 'gyur ba lta bu'o //
T02D2202:125a-2: de bas na 'jug pa'i yan lag gi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir //
T02D2202:125a-3: thog ma nyid du ni dgos pa'i dgos pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D2202:125a-4: de gang las 'byung ba shes par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2202:125a-5: de nas dgos pa dang 'brel pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D2202:125a-6: de ltar gzhan du yang brjod par bya ba la
T02D2202:125a-7: sogs pa tshol bar nus pa la ni thog mar
T02D2202:125a-8: brjod par bya ba bstan to //
T02D2202:125a-9: de nas dgos pa la sogs pa bsnyad par bya'o //
T02D2202:125a-10: de las 'di brjod par bya ba gang zhig ci na /
T02D2202:125a-11: 'di ltar lam dang 'bras bu dang spang bya ste /
T02D2202:125a-12: 'di ltar lam la ba rten nas 'bras bu thob
T02D2202:125a-13: pa des na de dang 'gal ba'i chos spong bar
T02D2202:125a-14: 'gyur ro // gal te de lta yin du zad mod /
T02D2202:125a-15: de nyid bstan pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2202:125a-16: de'i phyir sgra'i tshig la ma brten par nam yang rtogs pa mi 'byung ngo //
T02D2202:125a-17: gal te byung na ni thams cad gzhung gi tshig
T02D2202:125a-18: la sogs pa la mi ltos par der 'gyur ba
T02D2202:125a-19: zhig na de ni med do //
T02D2202:125a-20: gal te yod na rkyen gzhan la ltos te skye
T02D2202:125a-21: ba'am rkyen gzhan dang bral bas kye ba rtogs grang
T02D2202:125a-22: na dang po ltar na yang thams cad la thams
T02D2202:125a-23: cad skye ba'am / rgyu thams cad du rgyu la
T02D2202:125a-24: rang bzhin bye brag tu 'gyur ba med pas med
T02D2202:125a-26: phyi ma ltar na 'ba' zhig pa rnams la ni nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2202:125a-27: gal te de lta na yang 'gyur ro zhe na /
T02D2202:125a-29: 'bras bu yan lag ma tshad ba med pa'i phyir
T02D2202:125a-30: dus thams cad 'byung ba zhig na de ni med
T02D2202:125a-31: do // de bas na gzhung gi tshogs med na brjod par bya ba rtogs ba mi 'byung ngo //
T02D2202:125a-32: de bzhin du rtogs pa dgongs pa yin pa dang /
T02D2202:125a-33: gzhung thams cad yin pa la sogs par rtogs pa'i dgongs par yang mi 'byung ngo //
T02D2202:125a-34: de bas na shugs kyis gzhung gi tshogs 'di dag thabs yin la /
T02D2202:125a-35: dgos pa thabs las byung ba nyid kyis 'brel pa'ang bsnyad pa yin no //
T02D2202:125a-36: de bas na gzhung gis bstan pa blang ba dang
T02D2202:125a-37: dor ba la sogs pa ni dgos pa yin no
T02D2202:125a-39: rang dang gzhan gyi don sum tshogs par 'gyur te /
T02D2202:125b-0: bsgom pa'i rim gyis thog ma nyid du tshogs kyi lam la gnas par @125b byed do //
T02D2202:125b-1: de nas zab pa dang mi zab ba'i phye brag
T02D2202:125b-2: gi rim gyis drod thob par 'gyur ba la sogs
T02D2202:125b-3: pa sbyor ba'i rim gyis thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2202:125b-4: de nas chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid
T02D2202:125b-5: mngon sum du gyur pas mthong ba'i lam la sogs
T02D2202:125b-6: pa thob nas / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
T02D2202:125b-7: shes bya'i sgrib pa la sogs pa sa bon dang
T02D2202:125b-8: bcas pa bton pa ni rang gi don phun sum
T02D2202:125b-10: bskyed pa la sogs pa las su rung nas sems
T02D2202:125b-11: can rnams kyi snod dang snod dang snod ma yin
T02D2202:125b-13: mtho ris kyi lam ni dge ba dang bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D2202:125b-18: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam la dgod
T02D2202:125b-19: pa ni gzhan gyi don phun su tshogs pa ste
T02D2202:125b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02D2202:125b-22: gsang ba la ni gsang gnas pa'i //
T02D2202:125b-23: mthong dang goms pa'i rim pa yis //
T02D2202:125b-24: sangs rgyas sar ni 'gro bar byed //
T02D2202:125b-25: sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir //
T02D2202:125b-26: sna tshogs sku gsung thugs rnams kyis //
T02D2202:125b-27: byang chub sems ni bskyed byas na //
T02D2202:125b-28: so so'i 'bras bu thob par byed //
T02D2202:125b-30: gzhan yang theg pa chen po'i rigs kyi gang zag gis //
T02D2202:125b-31: dad po byang chub sems bskyed de //
T02D2202:125b-32: bsam gtan bsgoms pa'i rim pa yis //
T02D2202:125b-33: sangs rgyas sar ni 'gro bar byed //
T02D2202:125b-34: ces bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T02D2202:125b-35: de ltar dgos pa'i dgos pa mthar thug pa brjod nas ;
T02D2202:125b-36: gang dag dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bdag kyang srid pa legs par bzung nas 'jug par 'gyur la /
T02D2202:125b-37: chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dag kyang de lta
T02D2202:125b-38: bu la gnod pa dang bral bas 'jug par 'gyur
T02D2202:125b-39: ro // de ltar dgos pa brjod nas /
T02D2202:125b-40: da ni yan lag bshad par bya ste /
T02D2202:125b-41: de la 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2202:125b-42: 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba 'dis ni sdud pa po'i tshig tu brjod de /
T02D2202:125b-43: 'di kho na skad bshad pa bdag gis thos zhes par ston te /
T02D2202:125b-44: 'di'i dus ni 'di kho na ltar thos zhes so //
T02D2202:125b-45: gal te gzhan du mi 'khrul bar 'gyur ro /
T02D2202:126a-0: @126a * // zhes bya ba la sogs pa spangs pa yin no //
T02D2202:126a-1: yang 'di skad du bdag kho nas thos zhes par yang ston to //
T02D2202:126a-2: gang gis 'di ltar gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes ston to //
T02D2202:126a-3: dus gcig kho na'i tshe thos zhes pas kyang gzhan
T02D2202:126a-4: spong ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya bes te
T02D2202:126a-5: / 'dis chos gzhan dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2202:126a-6: dus gzhan dang ldan pa rnams gcod pa'o //
T02D2202:126a-7: gal te de lta na ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2202:126a-8: sdud pa thos pa mang ba dang /
T02D2202:126a-9: chos kyi 'khor lo rgyun mi 'chad pa la sogs pa spangs pa nyid do zhen ma yin te /
T02D2202:126a-10: gcig gis gcig gsal ba nyid kyi yang phyir ro //
T02D2202:126a-11: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang ma yin te /
T02D2202:126a-12: 'di dang lhan cig tu zhes pa'o //
T02D2202:126a-13: gal te de ltar na 'gal ba nyid do zhe
T02D2202:126a-14: na ma yin te sdud pa por gyur ba bdag
T02D2202:126a-15: kho na zhes pa'i don te /
T02D2202:126a-16: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzad nas /
T02D2202:126a-17: khams gsum rnams par rgyal ba khyod spobs par gyis shig ces gsungs pa dang /
T02D2202:126a-18: de nas khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba stan las langs te /
T02D2202:126a-19: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2202:126a-20: 'di kho na skad bshad pas kyang /
T02D2202:126a-21: chos gzhan spangs pa ma yin te de'i dus so //
T02D2202:126a-22: gal te de lta na sdud pa po thos pa
T02D2202:126a-23: chud ba yang ma yin te gzhan gyi tshe gzhan
T02D2202:126a-24: thos so // chos kyi 'khor lo rgyun ma chad pa dang 'gal ba yin te /
T02D2202:126a-25: dus gzhan du gzhan la rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2202:126a-26: 'di kho na zhes nges par gzungs bar mi nus te /
T02D2202:126a-27: rgyun du yang dang yang du 'byung ba ma yin pas rnyed par dka' ba nyid do //
T02D2202:126a-28: de bas na bdag kho nas thos zhes pa ni blo rno ba dang /
T02D2202:126a-30: rgyud rnyed par dka' ba ston te /
T02D2202:126a-31: thos zhes pa'i sgras skad cig gcig tsam gyis thos zhes pa ni blo rno ba bstan to /
T02D2202:126a-32: gzhan du ni skad cig tsam gyis 'dzin par gal nus /
T02D2202:126a-33: thos pa che ba yang 'di'i tshe 'di thos gzhan du gzhan thos zhes pas bstan te /
T02D2202:126a-34: des ni khyab pa nyid kyang bstan to //
T02D2202:126a-35: gzhan du ma thos zhes pa ni rgyud rnyed par dka' ba bstan te /
T02D2202:126b-0: thams cad @126b kyis gzhan gyi gnas su thos pa dang rnyed par ga la nus /
T02D2202:126b-1: de bas bdag kho na zhes pa 'gal ba med pa nyid do //
T02D2202:126b-2: gal te skad cig tsam gyis thos na ni de'i rim pa dang 'gal ba nyid do zhes na /
T02D2202:126b-4: byin gyi rlabs kyis ma 'gags pa'i rmi lam bzhin no //
T02D2202:126b-5: gzhan gyi tsho gzhan thos zhes pa yang de nyid de yin pa'am /
T02D2202:126b-6: de yang yin pa nyid do zhe na /
T02D2202:126b-8: gal te 'di nyid yin no zhe na /
T02D2202:126b-9: mngon sum du gang la yang gzhan du de ma grub pa nyid do //
T02D2202:126b-10: gal te de yang de yin no zhe na /
T02D2202:126b-11: thams cad thams cad du 'gyur ba shin tu gcig pa nyid do zhe na ni /
T02D2202:126b-12: de ni nyes pa med pa ste /
T02D2202:126b-13: 'di ltar khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba nyid de
T02D2202:126b-14: de'i dus na ni der snang ste bsam gyis mi
T02D2202:126b-15: khyab pa'i mthu dang so so'i rkyen gyis der snang
T02D2202:126b-16: ba nyid de zla ba dang chu bzhin no //
T02D2202:126b-17: de bas na don du ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba yang phyag na rdo rje nyid do ;
T02D2202:126b-18: / gzhan du na de ltar ston par ga la nus /
T02D2202:126b-19: gal te de lta na bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes ci'i phyir ma brjod ce na /
T02D2202:126b-20: de skang smras pa la yon tan lhag pa ci yod //
T02D2202:126b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' nyid du bstan pa nyid do //
T02D2202:126b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa bdag gis thos zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro //
T02D2202:126b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa
T02D2202:126b-25: zhes bya bas sdud pa po bdag nyid kyis mngon
T02D2202:126b-26: sum du thos par gsal te /
T02D2202:126b-27: ci nas kyang gcig tu brgyud pas smon pas bar gcod pa dang /
T02D2202:126b-28: sman pas lung bstan pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D2202:126b-29: ji skad bshad pas ldog par 'gyur ba nyid do //
T02D2202:126b-30: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa /
T02D2202:126b-31: bdag gis dus gcig na thos zhes pas ji skad smos pa'i nyes pa med do //
T02D2202:126b-32: sman pa rnams kyis bde bar rtogs so //
T02D2202:126b-33: de ltan ni 'di dang lhan cig tu zhes pa dang /
T02D2202:126b-34: 'dir zhes pa la sogs pa yang smos par gyur ro //
T02D2202:126b-35: de la der 'gyur la shugs kyis rtogs so zhes bya bar yang mi nus te mtshungs pa'i phyir /
T02D2202:126b-36: gal te de ltar na gzhung mang por 'gyur ba'i nyes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02D2202:127a-1: rtog pa nyid de la der 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yang gang gi phyir /
T02D2202:127a-2: dngos su thos zhes pa ltar na des gsungs pa /
T02D2202:127a-3: dngos su thos te ma gsungs pa la ni nam
T02D2202:127a-4: yang thos pa med do zhes 'jig rten na gsal
T02D2202:127a-6: gal te ma gsungs kyi dbyin gyis brlabs pa las thos pa zhes bya ba 'byung bas /
T02D2202:127a-7: de gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T02D2202:127a-8: byin gyis brlabs dang smon lam gyi mthus zhes bya ba las rtogs par gsungs so //
T02D2202:127a-9: zhes bya ba'i des pa ci zhig yod //
T02D2202:127a-10: gal te mdo las gnod pa dang //
T02D2202:127a-11: gzhan sgrub pa ni cung zad med de /
T02D2202:127a-13: gal te de ltar na bka' ma yin te dus phyis 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T02D2202:127a-15: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa las 'khor nye ba rnams kyis dris pa dang /
T02D2202:127a-16: mdo sde rnams la 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
T02D2202:127a-17: bcom ldan 'das che ge mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D2202:127a-18: 'khor de dag thams cad yi rang ste /
T02D2202:127a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
T02D2202:127a-20: do zhes bya ba'i bar gyis yang dag par byos
T02D2202:127a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lung dang mthun par
T02D2202:127a-23: yang dag par sdud par byed pas de skad du
T02D2202:127a-25: de ltar na mngon par yang sde snod gsum sdud
T02D2202:127a-26: pa'i dus su kun dga' bo'i gdong mchi ma dang
T02D2202:127a-27: bcas pas 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la
T02D2202:127a-29: gsung gis ma nor bar bstan pa bzhin no //
T02D2202:127a-30: de bas na rgyud thams cad kyi don ma lus par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2202:127a-31: 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2202:127a-34: byin rlabs chen po la sogs pa dang rab tu bcas pa'o //
T02D2202:127a-35: gal te 'di ltar na 'di zhes ba'am ;
T02D2202:127a-37: 'di rnams zhes pas kyang de kho na'i don thams cad ston par nus pas /
T02D2202:127a-38: 'di khon zhes pa nges par gsung bar mi bya'o zhe na /
T02D2202:127a-40: gang gi phyir thabs dang shes rab zab mo ston pa'i brdar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
T02D2202:127b-0: dza ri kham zhes pa bzhin @127b no ;
T02D2202:127b-1: / de ltar na bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang 'brel pa nyid du zhe na /
T02D2202:127b-3: gal te de ltar na sdud pa po med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T02D2202:127b-5: 'dir sems can 'dul ba'i dbang ma gtogs par ston pa zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2202:127b-6: sdud pa po zhes bya ba la sogs pa tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med do //
T02D2202:127b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02D2202:127b-9: gsang ba'i yi ge'i don rnams kun //
T02D2202:127b-10: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bstan du gsol //
T02D2202:127b-11: bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol //
T02D2202:127b-12: de skad ces gsol rab gsan nas //
T02D2202:127b-13: legs zhes lan gsum gsungs mdzad nas //
T02D2202:127b-14: rgyal ba'i sras la don 'di gsungs //
T02D2202:127b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02D2202:127b-16: gsang ba'i ye ge de rnams kun //
T02D2202:127b-17: das ni khyod la bshad par bya //
T02D2202:127b-18: khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon //
T02D2202:127b-19: ae ni nam mkha'i khams yin te ;
T02D2202:127b-20: /'byung ba sdud pa yongs dag pa'i //
T02D2202:127b-21: 'bras bu bde gshegs kun gyi bdag / gtso bo rdo rje gos sngon can //
T02D2202:127b-22: ba ni 'byung ba kun sdud chu //
T02D2202:127b-23: dkyil 'khor dag byang chu yi khams //
T02D2202:127b-24: yongs su dag pa lha yi sku //
T02D2202:127b-25: rin chen gos sngon zhes su bshad //
T02D2202:127b-26: la ni gcod ba'i sgra gcan sa //
T02D2202:127b-27: brtan dang g-yo ba'i ngo bo nyid //
T02D2202:127b-28: yongs su dag pa lha yi sku //
T02D2202:127b-29: bde gshegs gos sngon zhes su bshad //
T02D2202:127b-30: ma ni 'byung ba me rang bzhin //
T02D2202:127b-31: tsha zhing smin pa'i bdag nyid can /
T02D2202:127b-32: yongs su dag pa lha yi sku //
T02D2202:127b-33: padma gos sngon zhes su bshad //
T02D2202:127b-34: ya ni rlung du grags pa ste ;
T02D2202:127b-35: / yang zhing g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can //
T02D2202:127b-36: yongs su dag pa lha yi sku //
T02D2202:127b-37: las kyi gos sngon zhes su bshad //
T02D2202:127b-38: gsang ba bde ma bsgrub pa las //
T02D2202:127b-39: gzhan du gsang ba rnyed ma yin //
T02D2202:127b-40: gsang ba 'di yi dus rnams su //
T02D2202:127b-41: rnal 'byor mchog gis nan tan bya //
T02D2202:127b-42: aa ni nam mkha' yongs su dag / lus kun la ni gnas pa'i rlung //
T02D2202:127b-43: khyab byed ces su grags pa ste //
T02D2202:127b-44: nam mkha' rnam dag 'di las byung //
T02D2202:127b-45: la ni sa yi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2202:127b-46: snying drod rlung kha dog ser //
T02D2202:127b-47: gnyi ga las ni 'byung ba ste //
T02D2202:127b-48: yi ge la dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2202:128a-2: / lte bar mnyam gnas dkar zlum bdag / gnyi ga las ni dal bar 'byung /
T02D2202:128a-3: yi ge ba dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2202:128a-4: ma ni mi yi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2202:128a-5: mgrin pa gyen rgyu gru gsum dmar //
T02D2202:128a-6: g-yon pa nas ni 'byung ba ste //
T02D2202:128a-7: yi ge ma dang yang dag ldan na //
T02D2202:128a-8: yam ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2202:128a-9: gsang ba thur sel gzhu dbyibs ljang //
T02D2202:128a-10: g-yas pa nas ni 'byung ba ste //
T02D2202:128a-11: yi ge ya dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2202:128a-12: ae ni sgra yi rang bzhin can //
T02D2202:128a-13: la ni gzugs kyi bdag nyid can //
T02D2202:128a-14: de bzhin pa ni dri yi bdag / ma ni ro yi bdag nyid de'i //
T02D2202:128a-15: ya ni bya yi bdag nyid yin //
T02D2202:128a-16: de nyid srung ba'i mchog gi rgyud //
T02D2202:128a-17: gsang ba bde ba chen por 'byung //
T02D2202:128a-18: gang zhig 'di la rtag gnas na //
T02D2202:128a-19: rdo rje de nyid sdud pa thob //
T02D2202:128a-20: ces bde ba chen po bsgrub pa'i rtog pa de kho na nyid las 'byung ba dang /
T02D2202:128a-22: ae ni bde ba chen por 'byung //
T02D2202:128a-24: sa bon gsang ba mchog gi rgyas //
T02D2202:128a-25: de dbus nor bu bzang po nyid //
T02D2202:128a-28: gang zhig yon tan mchog gis rgyas //
T02D2202:128a-29: sprul pa'i sa bon yang dag ldan //
T02D2202:128a-30: gsang ba de ni bde ba che //
T02D2202:128a-32: longs spyod chen po dam pa nyid //
T02D2202:128a-34: rol pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa ste //
T02D2202:128a-35: dga' ba 'dir ni bsam par bya //
T02D2202:128a-36: ya ni kun du skyod byed rten //
T02D2202:128a-37: sna tshogs gsang ba bla na med /
T02D2202:128a-38: yon tan chos kyi 'khor lo ste /
T02D2202:128a-39: rdo rje thugs kyi bdag nyid 'grub //
T02D2202:128a-40: rlung dang rtsa dang 'khor lo dang //
T02D2202:128a-41: dag pa'i thig le'i rtags rnams ni //
T02D2202:128a-42: yi ge bzhi pas yang dag 'byung //
T02D2202:128a-43: chags dang grol ba'i dbang du gnyis //
T02D2202:128a-44: zhes de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud las 'byung ba lta bu'o //
T02D2202:128a-46: ae ni sku yi 'khor lo nyid //
T02D2202:128a-47: bam ni thugs kyi 'khor lo nyid ;
T02D2202:128a-48: / ma ni gsung gi 'khor lo nyid //
T02D2202:128a-49: ya ni bde ba chen po nyid //
T02D2202:128a-50: dbang bzhi la ni gang gnas pa //
T02D2202:128a-52: yi ge ae ni dbyings yin te /
T02D2202:128a-53: ba ni rol pa'i ye shes te //
T02D2202:128a-54: thig la gnyis med phyag rgya ste /
T02D2202:128a-55: de la longs spyod sprul pa 'byung //
T02D2202:128b-0: @128b zhes pa la sogs pa 'byung ba lta bu'o //
T02D2202:128b-1: de nas gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2202:128b-2: gnod sbyin thams cad yongs su rgyu pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2202:128b-3: de la gnod spyin gang ba bzang po dang //
T02D2202:128b-5: lngas rtsen zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2202:128b-6: de gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de ni /
T02D2202:128b-7: gnod sbyin thams cad yongs su rgyu ba'i gnas so //
T02D2202:128b-8: shin tu bden pa ni gnod pas brdzi ba med pa nyid do //
T02D2202:128b-9: 'di'i gdul bya phun sum tshogs pa gtsor bstan pa dang /
T02D2202:128b-10: bar du gcod par 'gyur ba spangs par bstan to //
T02D2202:128b-11: yongs su dag pa ni shel dangs pa lta bur gnas pa ste /
T02D2202:128b-12: 'di dag gi don yang shel gyi nang du chud
T02D2202:128b-13: pa lta bu'i gzhal yas khang shel du gsal ba
T02D2202:128b-14: / dkyil 'khor rgya na dang ldan pa'i dbus na
T02D2202:128b-15: bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2202:128b-17: gnod sbyin sde dbon chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2202:128b-18: de la gnod sbyin thams cad kyi gtso bo'i yang gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2202:128b-19: dus gsum gyi de bzhin du bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02D2202:128b-20: byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa'i dus
T02D2202:128b-21: su padma stong dang ldan pa'i dbus su bzhugs te
T02D2202:128b-22: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2202:128b-23: phyag na rdo rje khyod sod la //
T02D2202:128b-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan gyis kyang gsungs pa nyid do //
T02D2202:128b-25: mche ba gtsigs pa ni gang gis log par rtogs pa za ba'i phyir ro /
T02D2202:128b-26: yid khros pa ni zhi ba'i las kyis ni mi 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2202:128b-27: mig me mdag gi phung po 'dra ba ni bltas pa tsam gyis 'jigs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2202:128b-28: dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba ni /
T02D2202:128b-29: sgra tsam gyis 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2202:128b-31: ngag gi nyes pa can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2202:128b-32: la de dag kyang dman pa'i zas dang /
T02D2202:128b-34: dman pa la blta ba dang /
T02D2202:128b-35: brdzun la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang bral bar yang bstan la /
T02D2202:128b-36: gdul bya'i rtags thun mong ma yin pa yang bstan te /
T02D2202:128b-37: legs pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don to //
T02D2202:129a-2: ser po dang 'og nas ston pa'i dmar po rnams kyis lus brgyan pa ste /
T02D2202:129a-3: rang 'dod chags gtso bor gyur pa'i tshul khrims nyams pa dang bral zhing /
T02D2202:129a-4: phyir rol gyi klu rigs drug la sogs pa 'dul ba'i rtags su bstan to //
T02D2202:129a-5: bzhin rgyas pa ni gdong 'phel kha che ba ste /
T02D2202:129a-6: lha thams cad 'dul ba'i rtags su bstan pa'o //
T02D2202:129a-7: smin ma dpral bar bsdus pa ni khro gnyer me'i
T02D2202:129a-8: phreng ba dang bcas pa ste me lta 'dul ba'i
T02D2202:129a-9: phyir ro // ya sos ma mchu man na pa ni /
T02D2202:129a-11: gshin rdze'i cha byang can ni ;
T02D2202:129a-12: gsus pa che ba ste gshin rje'i rigs 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2202:129a-13: lag pa brdabs pas ni rdo rje dang ldan pa ste thams cad kyang ngo //
T02D2202:129a-14: aa la la zhes sgra sgrogs pa ni rlung lha dang gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2202:129a-15: gang rgyangs dgod pa ni 'byung po 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2202:129a-16: rgya mtsho la sogs pa gsum ni klu dang lha 'dul ba'i rtags te ci rigs su sbyar ro //
T02D2202:129a-17: de dang de dag gis ci zhig 'dul bar mdzad ce na /
T02D2202:129a-18: sbyor ba thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2202:129a-19: sbyor ba ni lha la sogs pa nad sna tshogs gtong ba'i thabs byas so //
T02D2202:129a-20: bzlog pa ni rang gi gnas su sbyar te /
T02D2202:129a-21: gnod pa'i bdag po dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2202:129a-22: gcod pa ni sbyor ba'i bdag po shi bar byed pa'o //
T02D2202:129a-23: yon tan ni sangs rgyas kyi dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2202:129a-24: ma lus pa'i bdag po ni thams cad kyi dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2202:129a-25: de lta bu'i yon tan ni stobs bcu dang /
T02D2202:129a-27: bsrung ba med pa gsum dang /
T02D2202:129a-28: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
T02D2202:129a-29: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid la sogs pa
T02D2202:129a-30: dang ldan par bzhugs so zhes bya ba dang sbyar
T02D2202:129a-32: 'di ltar bde gshegs gos sngon can zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2202:129a-34: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02D2202:129a-35: gnod sbyin thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pa nyid do //
T02D2202:129a-36: gnod sbyin mthu bo che ni gnod sbyin gzhan pas mthu'i bye brag thams cad du dpags pa'o //
T02D2202:129a-37: gnod sbyin drag po ni 'dir zhi ba la sogs
T02D2202:129b-0: pa'i las kyis @129b 'dul ba'i sprul pa yin te
T02D2202:129b-1: / 'dir gdul bya'i gtso bo gos sngon can gyi
T02D2202:129b-2: dbang du byas nas shin tu gong du smos pa
T02D2202:129b-4: lha ni ma h'a deb dang /
T02D2202:129b-6: de bzhin gzhan yang rang gi chung ma dang 'khor dang bcas te 'khor par gyur to //
T02D2202:129b-7: 'di ltar nyi ma dang zhes bya bas ni gtso bo'i yang gtso bo'i gzi brjid do //
T02D2202:129b-8: zla ba dang zhes bya bas ni /
T02D2202:129b-9: bde gshegs gos sngon po can la sogs pa'i gzi brjid nyid do //
T02D2202:129b-10: lha la sogs pa'i gzi brjid de /
T02D2202:129b-11: de lta bur gyur pa de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid do ;
T02D2202:129b-12: / dman par gyur pa'i gzi brjid kyis gnon pa dang /
T02D2202:129b-13: rang gdul bya'i don du sna tshogs par gyur pa nyid do //
T02D2202:129b-14: de'i tshe sa yang cher g-yos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2202:129b-15: de nas gleng bslang ba bstan pa /
T02D2202:129b-16: 'khor thams cad ni lha la sogs pa ste /
T02D2202:129b-17: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba gtso bor gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2202:129b-18: bla med gos sngon can khyod ces pa ni gnag yin zhes pa'o //
T02D2202:129b-19: gang dang gang yod ce na //
T02D2202:129b-20: bde gshegs kun gyis sprul pa'am //
T02D2202:129b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs 'od zer las sprul pa zhig gam zhes pa'o //
T02D2202:129b-24: gal te bsdus pa'i sku yin nam zhes pa sangs
T02D2202:129b-25: rgyas thams cad de'i ngo bor byas pa zhig gam
T02D2202:129b-26: / gal te las kyi khro bor dbang bskur ba'am zhes pa ni //
T02D2202:129b-27: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'am /
T02D2202:129b-28: der gyur pa zhig gam zhes pa'o //
T02D2202:129b-29: bdag 'khor dang bcas pa ni der tshogs pa nyid do //
T02D2202:129b-30: ji lta dus gsum bka' nyan te //
T02D2202:129b-31: zhes pa'i dus gsum bka' las mi 'da' ba nyid do //
T02D2202:129b-32: las dang bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D2202:129b-33: drag po'i ting nge 'dzin bstan du gsol zhes pa ni /
T02D2202:129b-34: sems can gyi don tu ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs pa la snyoms par zhugs shig pa'o //
T02D2202:129b-35: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
T02D2202:129b-36: bcom ldan 'das kyis khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba
T02D2202:129b-37: la sogs pa 'dus pa chen po'i 'khor rnams la
T02D2202:129b-38: bka' stsal pa / kye 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs //
T02D2202:130a-2: gang phyir dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D2202:130a-3: rang bzhin med cing mtshan nyid med //
T02D2202:130a-4: spros med g-yo ba me pa ste //
T02D2202:130a-6: nga yi bstan la nas pa la /
T02D2202:130a-7: rims dang dug la sogs pas 'tshe ;
T02D2202:130a-8: / de phyir nga ni khro bo'i gzugs //
T02D2202:130a-9: sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par snang //
T02D2202:130a-10: gang zhig de nyid sangs rgyas gzugs //
T02D2202:130a-11: 'gro ba'i dbang du sprul pa ste /
T02D2202:130a-12: sems can kun gyi don bsgrub phyir /
T02D2202:130a-13: dbang bskur bar yang dag bshad //
T02D2202:130a-14: da ni dus gsum kun du 'byung ;
T02D2202:130a-15: / da ni sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin //
T02D2202:130a-16: nga ni rgyud rnams ston pa ste /
T02D2202:130a-17: blun par gyur pa'i 'gro ba la /
T02D2202:130a-18: mig 'phrul tshul ni ston byed pa //
T02D2202:130a-19: zhes gsungs ma thag tu 'dus pa chen po'i 'khor
T02D2202:130a-20: thams cad kyis rmad du byung ba'i rol pa'i mchod
T02D2202:130a-21: pa chen pos khyab par gyur te zhes bya ba
T02D2202:130a-23: bdag ni dngos su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo
T02D2202:130a-24: bo yin yang sems can gyi don du dbang bskur
T02D2202:130a-26: 'dir le'u dang po gleng gzhi'i le'u ste des par 'byin par byed pas gleng bzhi zhes bya'o //
T02D2202:130a-27: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can
T02D2202:130a-28: gyi rgyud kyi rgya cher bshad pa las le'u dang
T02D2202:130a-31: // / de ltar gleng bzhi phun sum tshogs pa bstan kyang /
T02D2202:130a-32: lam rnam pa gnyis rdzogs par ma bstan na //
T02D2202:130a-33: sgrub pa la 'jug pa dag kyang dman par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T02D2202:130a-34: de nas 'phags pa gos sngon po can gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2202:130a-35: de la rdo rje drag po ni bskyed pa dang
T02D2202:130a-36: rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang bcas pa ste
T02D2202:130a-37: / sgrib pa'i ri 'joms pa'i phyir de skad de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2202:130a-38: gang gi phyir dang po rags pa'i rnal 'byor gyi
T02D2202:130a-39: dbang du byas te bskyed pa'i rim pa la bslab
T02D2202:130a-40: bo // de nas rags pa'i rnam par rtog pa las log ste /
T02D2202:130a-41: yul gang la yang rtse gcig pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2202:130a-42: de nas yid ni nang du bkug ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa la slob bo //
T02D2202:130a-43: de nas phra ba'i rnam par rtog pa las log nag stong pa nyid la nye bar 'gyur te /
T02D2202:130b-0: gang gi dang por bskyed @130b la gnas //
T02D2202:130b-1: rang gi las ni yang dag rdzogs //
T02D2202:130b-2: de nas slob brtag byas te //
T02D2202:130b-3: las su rung nas chos rnams kyi //
T02D2202:130b-4: de nyid nges par thob bar 'gyur //
T02D2202:130b-5: zhes 'byung ba la sogs pas kyang //
T02D2202:130b-7: de nas bskyed pa la sogs pa'i rim pa rgyas par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2202:130b-8: phyag rgya gsang sngags thugs sbyor las //
T02D2202:130b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2202:130b-10: byang chub kyi sems sngon du song ba'i yi ge ni sems yin //
T02D2202:130b-12: de la thugs kyi rtags 'byung ba ni thugs sbyor ro //
T02D2202:130b-13: de las byung ba'i dpal ldan gos sngon can ni
T02D2202:130b-14: khro bo de la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor
T02D2202:130b-15: los dbang bskur ba ni byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D2202:130b-17: don yang ya mtshan sna tshogs ldan //
T02D2202:130b-18: zhes pa gang la spros pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi
T02D2202:130b-19: rol gyi gdug pa can btul de slar 'dus pa
T02D2202:130b-20: 'dis sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gcig tu mdzad pa'o //
T02D2202:130b-21: de dag gi don yang thog mar 'og nas 'byung ba'i rim pas /
T02D2202:130b-23: sangs rgyas thams cad mdun du spyan drangs te /
T02D2202:130b-28: zhal zas la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2202:130b-29: bdag gis sdig ba ci bgyis dang //
T02D2202:130b-30: bgyid du stsal dang yi rang la //
T02D2202:130b-31: sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas su //
T02D2202:130b-32: ma lus so sor bshags par bgyi //
T02D2202:130b-33: zhes sdig pa bshags par bya'o //
T02D2202:130b-34: de nas phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag dang /
T02D2202:130b-35: nyan thos nas so so'i skye bo'i lam la gnas pa la rjes su yi rang bar bya'o //
T02D2202:130b-37: phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa'i //
T02D2202:130b-38: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2202:130b-39: sems can ma lus thams cad la //
T02D2202:130b-40: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol //
T02D2202:130b-43: rgyal ba mya ngan 'da' bzhed dam //
T02D2202:130b-44: ji srid sems can gnas kyi bar //
T02D2202:130b-46: bla med chos rnams bstan du gsol //
T02D2202:130b-48: de nas rang nyes pa las ldog pa'i bsam pas ci nus kyis ldog par bya //
T02D2202:131a-0: de nas tshad med pas byang @131a * //
T02D2202:131a-2: bsod nams kyi tshogs la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod bar bya'o //
T02D2202:131a-3: de nas phyi nang gi chos thams cad rang bzhin med par bya'o //
T02D2202:131a-4: de las langs te sems nyid ha ljang gu las
T02D2202:131a-5: sna tshogs rdo rje las rab dad dra bar gyur
T02D2202:131a-6: bar bya'o // de'i dbus su yam las rlung /
T02D2202:131a-8: sum las sa gzhir rab tu bcas pa /
T02D2202:131a-9: de'i steng du bhr'um las gzhal yas khad bskyed /
T02D2202:131a-10: padma brgyad pa mu khyung dang //
T02D2202:131a-11: gru chad khyams dang sgo bzhir bcas //
T02D2202:131a-12: rab dra ba phyed pa dang //
T02D2202:131a-13: pha gu dang ni rta babs dang //
T02D2202:131a-14: dar gyi bla re ba dan dang /
T02D2202:131a-15: phyi dang nang gi rgyan gyis mdzes //
T02D2202:131a-16: kun du gsang ba'i bdag nyid can //
T02D2202:131a-17: yongs su rdzogs pa'i rten du 'gyur //
T02D2202:131a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i nang
T02D2202:131a-19: du rang cho ga gsum gyis ji skad smos pa'i
T02D2202:131a-20: rgyan dang ldan pa'i skur bskyed la /
T02D2202:131a-21: ye shes kyi lha mdun du spyan drangs te mchod pa dang ;
T02D2202:131a-22: bstod pas mnyes par byas te gnyis su med par bstim mo //
T02D2202:131a-23: de nas rang gi rdo rje dag la h'um /
T02D2202:131a-24: de nas rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa nor bus mtshan pa dang /
T02D2202:131a-25: padma'i gzhal yas khang du byas la /
T02D2202:131a-26: kha byang du bltas pa'i padma'i sgro can du byas
T02D2202:131a-27: bas byin gyis brlabs nas snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang
T02D2202:131a-29: thig le dang yi ge las skur byas te /
T02D2202:131a-30: h'um h'um byas pa phyi rol du spros te /
T02D2202:131a-31: phyi'i gdug pa can rnams btul nas slar 'dus te /
T02D2202:131a-32: phyi'i gzhal yas khang du bzhugs pa 'di lta ste /
T02D2202:131a-33: bde gshegs gos sngon can ni shar gyi 'dab ma la bzhugs te /
T02D2202:131a-34: mdog dkar po gos sngon po'i sham thabs can /
T02D2202:131a-35: sprul dkar po'i rgyan cha can /
T02D2202:131a-37: g-yon na dril bu thogs pa /
T02D2202:131a-39: phyag g-yas kyi dril bu thugs kar 'khyud nas /
T02D2202:131a-40: g-yon pas khrag gi thod pa stobs pa /
T02D2202:131a-41: sku'i kha dog dkar pos shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa'o //
T02D2202:131a-42: de bzhin du rin chen gos sngon can lho'i 'dab ma la bzhugs te /
T02D2202:131a-43: mdog ser po gos sngon po'i sham thabs gsol ba /
T02D2202:131a-45: g-yas na rin po che 'bar ba /
T02D2202:131b-0: g-yon na dril du thogs @131b pa'o ;
T02D2202:131b-1: / nab kyi 'dab ma la padma gos sngon can bzhugs te /
T02D2202:131b-2: mdog dmar po gos sngon po'i sham thabs gsol ba /
T02D2202:131b-5: g-yon na dril bu thogs pa'o //
T02D2202:131b-6: byang gi phyogs kyi 'dab mal las kyi gos sngon can bzhugs te /
T02D2202:131b-8: gos sngon po'i sham thabs gsol ba /
T02D2202:131b-10: g-yas na rdo rje rgya gram /
T02D2202:131b-11: g-yon na dril bu thogs pa'o //
T02D2202:131b-12: mtshams rnams su ni rang gi lha mo /
T02D2202:131b-16: dri chab thogs pa dkar po dang /
T02D2202:131b-25: de'i phyogs su ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang /
T02D2202:131b-29: nang du padma'i mtshams su ni /
T02D2202:131b-30: thod pa byang chub kyi sems kyis bkang ba'o //
T02D2202:131b-31: de ltar lha'i 'khor lo yang dag par bskyed nas
T02D2202:131b-32: lha thams cad kyi gnas gsum du yi ge aom
T02D2202:131b-34: de nas snga ma bzhin du dbang blang bar bya'o //
T02D2202:131b-35: de nas rang gi sku la sems gtad de yang dang yang du bsgom zhing 'dres par bya'o //
T02D2202:131b-36: de nas gal te skyon rang gis sngags brgya'am stong la sogs pa bzlas te /
T02D2202:131b-37: 'di ngag gi dus su yang rang gis bon las 'od 'phros pas /
T02D2202:131b-38: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phog pas /
T02D2202:131b-39: de'i 'od kyis rang gi lus ngag yid gsum gyi sdig pa thams cad dbyung ba dang /
T02D2202:131b-42: yang na rang gi 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shangs su brgyud nas /
T02D2202:131b-43: rdo rje'i lam du yang brgyud de 'khor bar bsam pa dang /
T02D2202:131b-47: byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa bkug cing rang
T02D2202:131b-48: gi lus la 'ongs par bsams la sngags bzlas par
T02D2202:131b-49: bya'o // sngags bzlas pa'i dus su skyen pa dang /
T02D2202:131b-53: chung ba ma yin par bzlas te /
T02D2202:131b-54: 'di ltar 'dod chags kyis ma yin te /
T02D2202:132a-1: sogs pa'i sems kyis ma yin /
T02D2202:132a-2: zla bo dang gnyid la sogs pa'i bar chod ma yin par bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2202:132a-3: de nas gtor ma gtong bar 'dod na 'og nas
T02D2202:132a-4: 'byung ba'i gtor mas 'byung po thams cad tshim par
T02D2202:132a-5: bya ste / ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol la dam tshig sems dpa' rang la bsdus te /
T02D2202:132a-6: gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par bya'o //
T02D2202:132a-8: 'gro ba sogs pa spyod lam ci bde bas gnas par bya'o //
T02D2202:132a-9: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i yan lag dang bcas pa bshad zin to //
T02D2202:132a-10: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dbang du bshad pa /
T02D2202:132a-11: phyag rgya ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sku mthar phyin pa'o //
T02D2202:132a-12: gsang sngags ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa ste /
T02D2202:132a-14: de nyid rlung dang sngags 'dres pa'i tshul du dbyung ba dang /
T02D2202:132a-16: gnas pa'i rim gyis slob bo //
T02D2202:132a-17: thugs ni sems te 'dir sbyor ba ni dmigs pa'o //
T02D2202:132a-18: de bas na 'dir sems nyid kyi ngo bor rtogs pa'o //
T02D2202:132a-19: khro bo'i rgyal po ni de las 'byung ba na sgyu ma'i dpe nye bar mtshon pa'i sku'o //
T02D2202:132a-20: khro bo ni rdo rje nyid de /
T02D2202:132a-22: byin rlabs ya mtshan sna tshogs ldan //
T02D2202:132a-24: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2202:132a-26: dang po bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom //
T02D2202:132a-27: bskyed la brtan par gyur ba dang //
T02D2202:132a-28: gsal ba rlung la gnas par bya //
T02D2202:132a-29: de nas rlung dang thig ler bsam //
T02D2202:132a-31: blo gtad gnas pa brtan gyur na //
T02D2202:132a-32: thog mtha' med pa'i bsam gtan bya //
T02D2202:132a-33: de nas chos rnams thig le ste //
T02D2202:132a-34: thig le sems kyis rnam 'phrul nas //
T02D2202:132a-35: chos rnams sems kyi ngo bor brtan //
T02D2202:132a-36: sems nyid h'um las rdo rjer gyur //
T02D2202:132a-37: de las gsang ba'i bdag por bsam //
T02D2202:132a-38: rgyu ma'i dpe yis nyer mtshon na //
T02D2202:132a-39: rang bzhin kun bral rtogs las 'das //
T02D2202:132a-40: de las sna tshogs don med 'gyur //
T02D2202:132a-42: 'di dag gi don yang thog mar bskyed pa'i rim pa la brten nas /
T02D2202:132a-43: rang gi snying ga'i dbus su zla ba dang /
T02D2202:132a-44: nyi ma kha sbyor du gnas pa la byang chub kyi sems bltas la /
T02D2202:132b-0: dbugs 'byung ba'i dus su de la @132b 'od kha dog rnam pa lnga steng gi sgor 'thon te /
T02D2202:132b-1: sor bzhi'i rnam par gyur ba ste 'jug pa'i dus
T02D2202:132b-2: su de nyid 'jug pa dang gnas par bya ste
T02D2202:132b-3: / thog ma nyid du ni gtso bo'i 'od la slob bo //
T02D2202:132b-5: de nas gnyis pa la slob po //
T02D2202:132b-6: de nas gsum po la slob po /
T02D2202:132b-7: de nas lnga pa'i bar la slob bo //
T02D2202:132b-9: de'i thog ma'i gtso bo'i yang rten can no //
T02D2202:132b-10: de nas bde gshegs la sogs pa'i rten can no //
T02D2202:132b-11: de ltar gnas nas rang gi thig le la bltas te /
T02D2202:132b-12: 'dod chags la sogs pa 'di dag ni rang gi sems las byung nas /
T02D2202:132b-13: 'di las rgyu yang nges pa ci zhig yod /
T02D2202:132b-15: des ni de'i gting dpags par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2202:132b-16: gal te dus las 'byung ngo zhe na /
T02D2202:132b-17: skad cig la sogs pa shin tu phra ba'i dngos po brtag par bya'o //
T02D2202:132b-18: de nas rang lha'i skur langs te /
T02D2202:132b-19: sku de dag kyang skyu ma dang /
T02D2202:132b-22: brag ca dang mig yor dang /
T02D2202:132b-24: mgal mi'i phreng ba'i 'khor lo la sogs par brtag par bya'o //
T02D2202:132b-25: de ltar legs par rtogs pa de la de bzhin
T02D2202:132b-26: gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis rlob pa dang lung
T02D2202:132b-28: de ltar gyur nas rang 'od du zhu nas thig
T02D2202:132b-29: le snying po'i stobs kyis don dam pa'i dang la
T02D2202:132b-30: gzhag par bya'o // de la rang lha'i skur langs
T02D2202:132b-31: te don dam pa'i sku dang don dam pa dang
T02D2202:132b-33: don dam pa dang nye bar 'dres pa'i skus bden pa gnyis mngon du byas te /
T02D2202:132b-34: phyis mi slob pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2202:132b-35: spyod lam gyi rim pa'ang thog mar ni thams cad rlung gi 'gro ldog tu blta'o //
T02D2202:132b-36: des chos thams cad sems kyi ngo bor blta'o //
T02D2202:132b-37: de nas chos thams cad sgyu ma la sogs par blta'o //
T02D2202:132b-38: de nas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du blta'o//
T02D2202:132b-39: de ltar goms pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thun
T02D2202:132b-40: mong ma yin pa legs par gong na med par
T02D2202:132b-41: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2202:132b-42: de nas bum pa'i dbang bskur ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2202:132b-43: phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2202:133a-0: de las legs par bskyed pa'i bum pa'i nang du @133a * //
T02D2202:133a-1: h'um la sogs pa so so'i yi ge bsams pa ni gsang sngags so //
T02D2202:133a-2: de las rdo rjer gyur ba ni thugs sbyor ro //
T02D2202:133a-3: de las skur gyur pa ni khro bo'i rgyal po'i //
T02D2202:133a-4: de las ye shes kyi 'khor lo gzhug pa dang /
T02D2202:133a-8: rdzas bsgrub pa'i bar ni byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D2202:133a-9: des gang la dbu rgyan la sogs pa dang bcas
T02D2202:133a-10: pas dbang bskur bas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khru
T02D2202:133a-11: ba la sogs pa 'di ni ya mtshan sna tshogs
T02D2202:133a-12: ldan zhes so // de yang gzhan las /
T02D2202:133a-13: legs par sbyangs ba'i bum pa ru //
T02D2202:133a-14: rim gyis 'byung ba'i sku bsams te //
T02D2202:133a-15: byin brlabs chu yis bkrus pa yis //
T02D2202:133a-17: rdo rje dril bu bdag po'i mtshan //
T02D2202:133a-18: nyon mongs lnga yi dri ma 'khru //
T02D2202:133a-19: rtag tu sku lnga rdzogs par 'gyur //
T02D2202:133a-21: gsang pa'i dbang du byas te bshad pa /
T02D2202:133a-22: phyag rgya ni phyag rgya ma ste lhan cig skyes ba ma dang /
T02D2202:133a-25: de'i byin gyis brlab pa ste /
T02D2202:133a-26: de'i gnas thams cad du yi ge dgod pa ni gsang sngags thugs sbyor ni bsam gtan te /
T02D2202:133a-27: byang chub kyi sems dbab pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin to ;
T02D2202:133a-28: / khro bo'i rgyal bo ni bdag gtso bo'i ting
T02D2202:133a-29: nge 'dzin can te thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo
T02D2202:133a-30: bo'o // de slob ma'i ngag la byin la snang ba mtha' yas su gnas pa ni /
T02D2202:133a-32: des lce gsung la bde ba skyes pa ni /
T02D2202:133a-33: ya mtshan sna tshogs ldan zhes pa ste /
T02D2202:133a-35: lhan cig skyes pa'i rigs can dang //
T02D2202:133a-36: sngags dang zhing las skyes pa la //
T02D2202:133a-37: gnas rnams su ni yi ge bkod //
T02D2202:133a-38: de las skur gyur yab yum gsal //
T02D2202:133a-39: gnyis med sbyor bas sems phab ste //
T02D2202:133a-40: ma 'thor ma gram dag la byin //
T02D2202:133a-41: lce gsung bde ba myong ba ni //
T02D2202:133a-42: dngos grub rab mchog nyid du bshad //
T02D2202:133a-44: de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2202:133a-45: phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa sa ston te /
T02D2202:133a-46: phyag rgya la sogs pa gong dang 'dra'o //
T02D2202:133a-47: slob ma legs par sbyangs pa dang /
T02D2202:133b-0: dang por g-ya' bslad pa sngon du 'gro @133b bas gnyis su med par snyoms par zhugs te /
T02D2202:133b-1: byang chub kyi sems phab nas lcags kyus bzung bas
T02D2202:133b-2: zag pa med pa'i bde ba nyams su myong ba
T02D2202:133b-3: ni / ya mtshan sna tshogs ldan zhes bya'o //
T02D2202:133b-5: phyag rgya ma 'di legs gnas la //
T02D2202:133b-6: 'dod pa'i rtsa ni bzung gyur nas //
T02D2202:133b-7: nam mkha' gad bar gyur ba dang //
T02D2202:133b-8: lha sbyin sna ni sbrang byas te //
T02D2202:133b-9: gnas dgu dag ni sen mo dag / gnyis med gcig sbyor dag tu gnas //
T02D2202:133b-10: 'khor lo gsang ba bsam bya ste /
T02D2202:133b-11: bskyod pa'i rlung gis drod 'bar bas //
T02D2202:133b-12: bde chen byang chub mgrin par babs //
T02D2202:133b-13: de ni mi bskyod dag pa ste //
T02D2202:133b-14: mi bskyod snying gar mi bskyod brten //
T02D2202:133b-15: lta ba la sogs de bzhin no //
T02D2202:133b-16: de nas rdo rje rtse mo las //
T02D2202:133b-17: rlung gi lcags kyus dkrugs par bsam //
T02D2202:133b-18: des ni bde ba chen par 'gyur //
T02D2202:133b-20: dbang bzhi ba'i 'bras bur gyur ba de'i gnas skabs su gzhag gi / gzhan du ma yin no //
T02D2202:133b-21: gal te thams cad kyang de lta bu'o zhe na /
T02D2202:133b-22: 'dir mchog tu gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2202:133b-23: gal te 'od mchog ma yin zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2202:133b-24: des par gzung ba ni ci yang med do //
T02D2202:133b-25: gzhan dag ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang lan gnyis ma yin no zhes zer ro //
T02D2202:133b-26: kha cig ci de las dpag pa'i rten can dang brten pa med pa kho na'o zhes zer ro //
T02D2202:133b-27: gzhan ni rjes su gnang ba la sogs pa'o zhes zer ro //
T02D2202:133b-28: de nas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi zhar la dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2202:133b-29: rang gzhan 'phags dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2202:133b-30: de 'phags pa rab ni dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2202:133b-31: bsgrub pa'i lha mnyes par byed pa ste /
T02D2202:133b-33: yang dag sangs rgyas mnyes bya'i phyir //
T02D2202:133b-34: byang chub sems ni spang mi bya //
T02D2202:133b-35: lha la spod len mi bya ste //
T02D2202:133b-36: sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad //
T02D2202:133b-37: 'gro ba dman la byams pa dang //
T02D2202:133b-38: gang gis gsang ba bstan par bya //
T02D2202:133b-39: gsang ba'i sdom pa thams cad bsrung //
T02D2202:133b-40: mchod dang mnyes pa bshags la brtson //
T02D2202:133b-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa shes par bya'o //
T02D2202:133b-42: bla ma dang shin tu bla ma zhes pa ni //
T02D2202:133b-43: dbang bskur man dag ston pa yi //
T02D2202:134a-2: gang gis yon tan 'byung ba des //
T02D2202:134a-3: bla ma srog bzhin gzung bar bya //
T02D2202:134a-4: gzhan yang sems dang 'gal ba yi //
T02D2202:134a-5: chos ni nam yang spang bar bya //
T02D2202:134a-6: bla ma'i thugs dang 'gal ba ni //
T02D2202:134a-7: sems ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2202:134a-9: dge ba gang dang gang spyad pa //
T02D2202:134a-11: bskal pa chen por ngan 'gror sreg / bla ma la ni 'khyal tshig smras /
T02D2202:134a-12: dmyal srung rab tu gtum po yis //
T02D2202:134a-13: lce ni phur pas brgyangs byas te //
T02D2202:134a-14: rab tu drag po'i mtshon gyis gtub //
T02D2202:134a-15: bla ma la ni ser sna ldan //
T02D2202:134a-16: bla ma yi yo byad tshogs la len //
T02D2202:134a-17: dus kun bde ba zas dang phral //
T02D2202:134a-18: skad cig bcu bcu'i bar dag tu //
T02D2202:134a-19: lcags zangs khu ba 'bar ba ldugs //
T02D2202:134a-20: shes rab mdzes pa'i rgyan can dang //
T02D2202:134a-21: gang yang rdo rje spun rnams la //
T02D2202:134a-22: gang gis nyes dang bcas pa'i las //
T02D2202:134a-23: rnam pa kun du spyad 'gyur la //
T02D2202:134a-24: dus kun dge ba zad nas ni //
T02D2202:134a-27: // de nas dngos grub 'dod pa yis //
T02D2202:134a-28: bla ma sangs rgyas sngon du mchod //
T02D2202:134a-29: de las 'jig rten legs pa rnams //
T02D2202:134a-31: gang zhig dpal ldan rdo rje can //
T02D2202:134a-34: de las sdom pa phun sum tshogs pa ni dngos
T02D2202:134a-35: grub dam pa'i rten dam pa'o zhes bya ba nges
T02D2202:134a-36: par bzung nas de la gnas nas ji skad smos
T02D2202:134a-37: pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D2202:134a-38: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas nas bdud dang bar du gcod pa thams cad ngang gis zhi ste /
T02D2202:134a-39: bde ba thab par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2202:134a-40: gal te gzhan la phan 'dogs na //
T02D2202:134a-41: sku de sna tshogs sku ru snang //
T02D2202:134a-42: zhes pa ni gal te gdug pa can 'dul bar 'dod na /
T02D2202:134a-44: phyag g-yon pas dril bu dor te /
T02D2202:134a-45: gdug pa can gang yin pa gzung bar bsam mo //
T02D2202:134a-50: rin po che dang padma gos sngon po can de gyur bas byed //
T02D2202:134b-0: thog ma'i skur sangs rgyas rgyas thams @134b cad mdun du bltas pa /
T02D2202:134b-1: de nas mchod pa la sogs pa thams cad kyis mnyes par byas la //
T02D2202:134b-2: dbang thob nas de ru 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2202:134b-3: lhag ma rnams kyi sku de dag don dam par
T02D2202:134b-4: ma grub pa las snang ba tsam du'o zhes bya
T02D2202:134b-5: ba'i don to // 'phags pa lag na rdo rje
T02D2202:134b-6: sngon po can gyi rgyud kyi rgya cher bshad pa
T02D2202:134b-7: las le'u gnyis pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
T02D2202:134b-9: // / de ltar lam rnam pa gnyis bstan nas /
T02D2202:134b-10: da ni sngags btub bshad pa'i phyir /
T02D2202:134b-11: gzhan yang yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02D2202:134b-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2202:134b-13: da ha ni sregs shig pa'o //
T02D2202:134b-14: sogs pa zhes bya bas gzhan gyi sngags kyi mtha'i don yang shes par bya ste /
T02D2202:134b-15: gang gis a'a li dang k'a li legs par sbyar
T02D2202:134b-16: ba las 'byung ba'i sngags rtsa ba'i sngags sbrel bas
T02D2202:134b-17: / de'i don dang mthun pa'i las thams cad brtsam par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2202:134b-18: gnyis kyi 'og ma gsum pas brgyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don to //
T02D2202:134b-19: grihna grihna zhes pa ni zung zhig rab tu zung shig pa'o //
T02D2202:134b-20: rtsa ba'i sngags dngos su bas /
T02D2202:134b-23: ta th'a ya ta th'a ya zhes pa gtogs shig pa'o //
T02D2202:134b-24: pa tsa pa tsa tshos shig pa'o //
T02D2202:134b-25: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje sngon po can gyi
T02D2202:134b-26: rgyud kyi rgya cher bshad pa las le'u gsum pa'i
T02D2202:134b-28: / de nas me'i 'khor lo'i sngags kyi yon tan bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2202:134b-29: de nas 'phags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2202:134b-30: sna tshogs sngon par grub pa ni las sna tshogs mngon par byed pa'i sngags bsrung bar dgos pa'o //
T02D2202:134b-33: zhes pa ni sngags gzungs su 'dzin pa ste /
T02D2202:134b-34: sngags kyi gnyis pa spangs nas bsam gtan dang bcas pas ma chad par byed pa'o //
T02D2202:134b-35: bsam gtan thog ma nyid du ni //
T02D2202:134b-36: rang gi dmigs par gsal bar byed do //
T02D2202:134b-37: de nas ni h'um ram ham gi rnam pa la
T02D2202:134b-38: dmigs te lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdig pa
T02D2202:134b-40: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo dang bcas
T02D2202:134b-41: pa gang ye shes sems dpa' dang bcas pa dang
T02D2202:134b-42: / de nyid rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2202:135a-1: 'ba' zhig pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2202:135a-2: phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2202:135a-3: mgal me lta bu dang phreng ba nyi ma lta bu'i rigs bdag gi mtshan mngon du byed do //
